trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" /> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=nameWithType>引发事件时`DataBind`在调用过程中在该项上调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> that is the source of the event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" /> class, setting the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> object as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 对象设置为事件源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs> using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> that represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>, and how to pass the event arguments to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>，以及如何将传递的事件自变量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为事件源的节点项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> that is the source of the event.
